languages.text: "Неумирающий не заботится о душах ксеносов, и потому посмертие их ужасно".
languages.translation_comment: Argenta: "Even the wicked xenos were no match for the scourge that has befallen them. How pitiful their empty shells look..."

languages.text: "The Undying One cares not for the souls of xenos, and so what awaits them after death is terrible indeed."
languages.original_text: "Неумирающий не заботится о душах ксеносов, и потому посмертие их ужасно".

traits.locale_text: "The Undying One cares not for the souls of xenos, and so what awaits them after death is terrible indeed."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The Undying One cares not for the souls of xenos, and so what awaits them after death is terrible indeed."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: "Der Todlose hat kein Interesse an den die Seelen von Xenos. Was sie nach dem Tod erwartet, ist daher grauenhaft."
languages.original_text: "The Undying One cares not for the souls of xenos, and so what awaits them after death is terrible indeed."

traits.locale_text: "Der Todlose hat kein Interesse an den die Seelen von Xenos. Was sie nach dem Tod erwartet, ist daher grauenhaft."
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: « L'Immortel n'a cure des âmes des xénos, et c'est ce qui fait toute l'horreur du sort qui les attend après la mort. »
languages.original_text: "The Undying One cares not for the souls of xenos, and so what awaits them after death is terrible indeed."

traits.locale_text: « L'Immortel n'a cure des âmes des xénos, et c'est ce qui fait toute l'horreur du sort qui les attend après la mort. »
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: «Al Inmortal no le importan las almas de los xenos. El destino que les espera es verdaderamente terrible».
languages.original_text: "The Undying One cares not for the souls of xenos, and so what awaits them after death is terrible indeed."

traits.locale_text: «Al Inmortal no le importan las almas de los xenos. El destino que les espera es verdaderamente terrible».
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: 「不死の者は異種族の魂など気にとめていない。だから、死後に待っているのは実に恐ろしいものだ」
languages.original_text: "The Undying One cares not for the souls of xenos, and so what awaits them after death is terrible indeed."

traits.locale_text: 「不死の者は異種族の魂など気にとめていない。だから、死後に待っているのは実に恐ろしいものだ」
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.text: “不死之神并不在乎异形的灵魂。那些异形死了之后，等待他们的命运确实非常可怕。”
languages.original_text: "The Undying One cares not for the souls of xenos, and so what awaits them after death is terrible indeed."

traits.locale_text: “不死之神并不在乎异形的灵魂。那些异形死了之后，等待他们的命运确实非常可怕。”
traits.speaker: KibellahCompanion

languages.original_text: "The Undying One cares not for the souls of xenos, and so what awaits them after death is terrible indeed."
